channel.title: Gaming on anmorris.org
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on anmorris.org

item.title: Extra Life 2018
item.description: I’m participating in Extra-Life again this year. It’ll be my fourth year taking part in Extra-Life, and I’m excited to be doing so. Last year I managed to raise over $1,000 with the support of my friends and family and am hoping to surpass that goal again this year. Please check out my page and donate if you’re able. I’ll be streaming all day on Game Day and will be posting updates to that page about my efforts.

item.title: A brief review of Black Ops 4
item.description: I don’t intend to use this blog solely for game reviews, but since I have a few people interested in my thoughts on the new Call of Duty: Black Ops 4 I will put my thoughts here because it honestly will be easier to write here than on my phone or in chat. As an aside, I have two other new posts in progress but one involves a project I’m not ready to reveal yet, and another is regarding some personal research I’ve been doing on Programming Language Expressiveness & Safety.
